reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Finnpartnership: Feasibility study related to establishment of research development and training centre in Tansania

description.narrative: It will be carried out in the project all necessary studies for launching the Research Development and Training Centre in Tanzania as Finnish-Tanzanian co-operation. Activities include:WP1: Completing the consortium and drafting the contracts- Selection of best available Tanzanian partners - Completion of the existing Finnish consortium (JVG Partners) to achieve as strong knowledge capacity as possible.WP2: Identifying training needs and designing training (energy/logistics/safety)- Identification of potent ial customers their training needs and existing training- Developing a knowledge-based mapping tool in selected areas- Evaluation the utilization of the Finnish Qualification Certificate in local conditions- Identification of the existing Training (Competi tor analysis)- Planning the measures to promote educational gender equality (employment of women especially in the logistics sector)- Incorporating sustainable development and sustainable use of resources into planning of training- Designing a training off er for the training centre to be foundedWP4: Preparing the Business Plan- On the basis of studies made in previous work packages it will be prepared the Business Plan for the Research Development and Training Centre so that the Centre?s operation can be st arted profitable with the lowest possible risk. Defining appropriate pricing models to cover expenses. The Business Plan creates the base for economic launching of the Centre.
